description: Plug g.f. for A000108 (minus the leading 1), 1/2*(1-(1-4*x)^(1/2))/x - 1, into cycle index for dihedral group D_3.
formula: Cycle index for D_3: 1/6*Z[1]^3+1/2*Z[1]*Z[2]+1/3*Z[3].O.g.f.: 1/6*A(x)^3 + 1/2*A(x)*A(x^2) + 1/3*A(x^3), with A(x):=1/2*(1-(1-4*x)^(1/2))/x - 1 (see the name). For the cycle index of the dihedral group D_n see A212355 for the Harary-Palmer reference, the formula and a link. - From _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jun 02 2012.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 19 2001
